name: Informash
description:
Experience the futuristic world of the Internet! Go "surfing" and "browsing," fight off warez and spamloids with your cyber gun, and earn some magic Internet money by retrieving a lost file.

Please download a native build if you can. The browser version works, sort of, but it'll likely have performance issues. It's only here in case everything else fails.

Made for the Death and the Internet Game Jam.

For credits, see in-game option. I'd like to emphasize that the logos belonging to some real-world organisations and applications appear in the game (including Mozilla Firefox, Internet Explorer, and the Chaos Computer Club). I claim no affiliation with those fine folks, and permission was neither sought nor given.

Controls are listed in-game, but here they are again for easy reference.


GamepadKeyboardMoveD-Pad left or right
Left analog stickA and D
Left/right arrow keyJumpBottom face button (likely A)JInteractD-Pad up
Left analog stick up
W
Up arrow key


AttackHold down right face button (likely B)Hold down K
GrenadePress upper or right face button (likely X/Y)Press L



MenuPress STARTPress ESCMapHold down SELECT or BACK or whatever other button is next to StartHold down M

Can't figure out how to get to the top level of the server? Observe the colour of the blocking platform, and the spade symbol next to it. Where have you seen that before?

If you are well and truly stuck, click here.
